MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: A man claiming to be Great Sage Lord Chococlay appears out of the blue and lies that he knows how to restore Shanghai.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: 突然とつぜん現あらわれた大賢者だいけんじゃチョコクレイ卿きょうと名乗なのる男おとこは、＊Shanghaiを元もとに戻もどす方法ほうほうを知しっているとうそぶいた。

MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: But the key cure, he says, is to give the man handmade chocolate.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: だが肝心かんじんの治療ちりょう法ほうが、男おとこに手作てづくりチョコを渡わたすことだと言いう。

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: How about it, uncle, have you learnt your lesson a little?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: どうだおじさん、ちょっとは懲こりたか?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Great Sage Chococlay
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: So mean, I didn't even hit anyone at all...
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: ひどい、なにもぶつことないのに......

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I'm in serious trouble, and yet you tell me that if I give you chocolate I'll be cured.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: わたしは真剣しんけんに悩なやんでいるのに、＊チョコをくれれば治なおるとか言いうからだぞ

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Great Sage Chococlay
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: It's true, re... Damn it!
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: 本当ほんとうなのに......ちくしょー!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ah, don't run away!
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: あっ、逃にげるな!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Let's go after him!
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: 追おいかけましょう!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Wait, don't chase him. We are not familiar with this archive. We should avoid going after him too far, as it could make the situation worse.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: 待まて、追おいかけなくていい。＊私わたしたちはこの書庫しょこに詳くわしくない。＊状況じょうきょうが悪化あっかする可能性かのうせいがあるから深追ふかおいは避さけるべきだ

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Austerlitz
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Looks pretty busy. What's going on?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: 賑にぎやかですね。＊何なにかあったんですか?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: You've come at the right time, Austerlitz, because just now a suspicious man had turned up and calls himself the Great Sage.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: ちょうどいいところに来きてくれた、Austerlitz。＊たった今いま、自分じぶんを大賢者だいけんじゃと名乗なのる不審ふしんな男おとこが現あらわれてね

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: This uncle advised me that if I gave him some handmade chocolate, he would cure my symptoms.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: そのおじさん、＊手作てづくりチョコをくれたらわたしの症状しょうじょうが治なおるってアドバイスをくれたんだ

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: But I thought to myself, this must be a lie. Because we both knew this is Austerlitz's library!
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: でもわたし、ピンと来きたんだ。＊これはウソに違ちがいないってね。＊だってここがAusterlitzの書庫しょこだってわたしたちは知しってたからな!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Austerlitz
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: But this isn't my library though?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: わたくしの書庫しょこではありませんよ?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Eh?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: え?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Austerlitz
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I have only recently discovered this archive and have been exploring it for new knowledge.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: わたくしは最近さいきんこの書庫しょこを発見はっけんして、＊新あらたな叡智えいちが眠ねむっていないかと探索たんさくしていただけですよ

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Austerlitz
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: You know, sometimes you find rare erotica in second-hand bookshops. I came here with the intention of searching for such treasures.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: ほら、たまに古本屋ふるほんやでレアなオトナの本ほんを見みつけたりするじゃないですか。＊そんなお宝たからを探さがす感覚かんかくで訪おとずれたのです

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: But I thought Beijing told me that 'the archives are like Austerlitz's garden'.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: でも『この書庫しょこはAusterlitzの庭にわみたいなもの』って＊ペイジンじんと話はなしてたじゃん

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: ...No, no I didn't, Shanghai, I did not say 'the archives are like Austerlitz's garden'. I said, 'The archives are like a garden to you, wise sage.'.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: ......いや、違ちがうShanghai。＊私わたしは『この書庫しょこはAusterlitzの庭にわみたいなもの』とは言いってない。＊正ただしくは『書庫しょこは賢者けんじゃと呼よばれるキミの庭にわみたいなものだろうからね』だ

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Aaah, that's what you meant!?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: ああ、そういうことか!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Please wait, please explain it so I can understand what's going on!
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: 待まって下ください、私わたしにも分わかるように説明せつめいお願ねがいします!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Austerlitz heard 'the archives are like the garden of a wise sage', and thought we were talking about an image of a wise sage, isn't that right?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: Austerlitzは『書庫しょこと言いえば賢者けんじゃの庭にわみたいなものだよね』という＊賢者けんじゃに対たいするイメージの話はなしだと思おもっていたということだ。＊そうだろう?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Austerlitz
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Mademoiselle Beijing is right.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: Beijingさんの仰おっしゃる通とおりです

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I-I see...
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: な、なるほど

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I didn't say 'this archive' from the very beginning, so the conversation proceeded without mutual understanding. This is my mistake. My apologies, everyone.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: 最初さいしょに『この書庫しょこ』と言いわなかったから、＊互たがいの認識にんしきがずれたまま会話かいわが進すすんでしまった。＊私わたしのミスだ。みんなすまない

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Don't apologise, bo-shi. If bo-shi didn't understand something, I wouldn't have understood it anyway.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: 謝あやまらないで下くださいよBo-shi。＊Bo-shiが分わからないものは、＊どのみち私わたしには分わからなかったですから

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: But if that's the case, that means the owner of this archive is still that uncle...?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: でもそうすると、＊この書庫しょこの主あるじはやっぱりあのおじさん......?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Great Sage Chococlay
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Huhaha, did you call the owner of the archive?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: ふはは、書庫しょこの主あるじを呼よんだかね?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ugh, there you are. Uncle, did you hear what I just said?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: うっ、出でちゃった。＊おじさん、今いまの話はなし聞きいてた?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Great Sage Chococlay
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: This Great Sage Lord Chococlay, of course has heard what you just said.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: この大賢者だいけんじゃチョコクレイ卿きょう、＊もちろん今いまの話はなしかと聞きいていたぞ

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Great Sage Chococlay
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: So, towards the 'only one who can cure your condition', do you have anything to say to this Great Sage Lord Chococlay?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: それで『唯一ゆいいつお主あるじの症状しょうじょうを治なおすことができる』この大賢者だいけんじゃチョコクレイ卿きょうに、＊何なにか言いうことはないかね?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ah, I'm sorry for calling you a suspicious uncle and shunned you away, I'm sorry...
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: あ、怪あやしいおじさんとかいってぶったりして、ごめんなさい......

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Great Sage Chococlay
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: That was painful. But as I have an open heart, I will forgive you. Let me help you with your symptoms.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: あれは痛いたかったなあ。＊だが心こころの広ひろいわしはお主あるじを許ゆるそう。＊お主あるじの症状しょうじょうを治なおしてあげようじゃないか

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Wait, when you say you'll cure Shanghai's symptoms, you don't really mean 'give you handmade chocolates' as you said earlier, do you?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: 待まて、Shanghaiの症状しょうじょうを治なおすって、＊まさか先さきほど言いってた『手作てづくりチョコを渡わたす』ってものじゃないだろうな?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Great Sage Chococlay
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Exactly. But this time I demand handmade chocolate from everyone here, not just the girl with the symptoms there!
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: その通とおりだ。＊だが今度こんどはそこの症状しょうじょうを抱かかえた娘むすめだけじゃなく、＊この場ばの全員ぜんいんの手作てづくりチョコを要求ようきゅうする!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: You're asking for more!?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: 増ふえてるじゃないか!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Great Sage Chococlay
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: It can't be helped, because I'm hurt. So it has to be from all of you. Ah～ It's a problem to get real chocolate from four people～
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: 仕方しかたないだろう、だってわし傷きずついたもん。＊だから全員ぜんいんからじゃなければ駄目だめだ。＊ああ～四よん人にんから本気ほんきのチョコ貰もらうなんて困こまったな～ー

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: You're obviously on a roll...
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: 目めに見みえて調子ちょうしに乗のってる......

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Oi Great Sage. Why would giving you chocolate cure Shanghai's symptoms?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: おい大賢者だいけんじゃ。＊どうしてお前まえにチョコをあげたらShanghaiの症状しょうじょうが治なおるんだ?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Great Sage Chococlay
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: It fills me up! ......I mean you don't have to understand. The wisdom of the Great Sage is incomprehensible to ordinary people.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: わしが満みたされる!＊......まあ分わからなくてもいい。＊大賢者だいけんじゃの叡智えいちは凡人ぼんじんには理解りかいできぬものだからな

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: ......What did you say?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: ......なんだって?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Hmph, this is the first time I've received such an evaluation. It's kind of amusing--
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: ふふ、こんな評価ひょうかは初はじめてだ。＊なんだか楽たのしくなっ――

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: HWACHAAAAH!!!!
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: ホワチャァーッ!!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Great Sage Chococlay
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: BHWEEH!?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: ぶへぇっ!?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I will not allow you to insult bo-shi!
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: Bo-shiを侮辱ぶじょくすることはこの私わたしが許ゆるしません!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Bo-shi, I know that bo-shi you are the most amazing person in world! So you shouldn't be affected by this kind of rhetoric!
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: Bo-shi、Bo-shiは世界一せかいいちすごいってこの私わたしが知しってますから!＊だからこんな暴言ぼうげんを気きにしちゃダメですよ!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: ......Thank you Tianjin, but I was going to undergo a big decision from there, so let me land the coup-de-grace next time if I may.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: ......ありがとうTianjin。＊でもあそこからビシッびしっと決きめるつもりだったから、＊できれば次つぎは最後さいごまで言いわせてくれ

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Tianjin
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ugh, sorry bo-shi.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: う、すみませんBo-shi

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Eh, there's nothing to apologise for.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: まあ謝あやまるほどのことでもないさ

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Now then, Shanghai, I don't think the way to fix you is the way the Great Sage says, but how about we just pummel him again and find out?
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: さて、Shanghai。＊私わたしはキミを治なおす方法ほうほうが大賢者だいけんじゃの言いう方法ほうほうだとは思おもえないんだが、＊とりあえずもう一度いちど懲こらしめて聞きき出だすというのはどうだろうか

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Hear hear! I agree with Beijing's idea!
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: 賛成さんせい!わたしもペイジンじんと同おなじ考かんがえだ!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Great Sage Chococlay
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Eh? I'm not getting chocolate from everyone? Th-, then, just the beastkin maiden over there can give me some chocolate--
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: え?みんなチョコくれないの?＊じゃ、じゃあそっちの獣人じゅうじんの娘むすめだけでもチョコを――

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Austerlitz
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Mademoiselle Tianjin's absolute trust and dearness, who gets angry before Mademoiselle Beijing herself... Pant, pant, various lewd delusions are squirting on this Litz...
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: Beijingさんご本人ほんにんより先さきに怒おこるTianjinさんの絶対ぜったい的てきな信頼しんらいと親愛しんあい......。＊はぁ、はぁ、色々いろいろと妄想もうそうが捗はかどるリッツです......

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Great Sage Chococlay
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I-I'll pr-pretend I didn't hear that...
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: き、聞きこえてない......

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Beijing
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Now, let's see how the Great Sage would escape this brilliantly from here.
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: さあここから先さき、＊大賢者だいけんじゃならどう鮮あざやかに切きり抜ぬけるかを是非ぜひ見みせてくれ

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Great Sage Chococlay
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I-I won't accept that you can't give me chocolate!
MSceneDetailViewModel.Ruby: くっ、チョコくれないなんて認みとめないぞー!

r.Title: 要求ようきゅうはさらに増ふえて
